{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Cleaning {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Cleaning Cleaning is the process of removing unwanted substances, such as dirt, infectious agents, and other impurities, from an object or environment. Cleaning occurs in many different contexts, and uses many different methods. Several occupations are devoted to cleaning.
